main_pack.ring.client
Class RingClient

java.lang.Object
  main_pack.ring.common.RingCommon
      main_pack.ring.client.RingClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class RingClient
extends RingCommon
implements java.lang.Runnable

RingClient Class Client Thread per la gestione del comportamento Client del generico peer. Implementa le fasi fondamentali di bootstrap e conoscimento del proprio ip.
